abstract: The activist investor Warren Lichtenstein said Monday that his hedge fund, Steel Partners II, had amassed enough support to remove Adaptec’s chief executive, Sundi Sundaresh, from the board of data storage company.
snippet: The activist investor Warren Lichtenstein said Monday that his hedge fund, Steel Partners II, had amassed enough support to remove Adaptec’s chief executive, Sundi Sundaresh, from the board of data storage company.
lead_paragraph: After a long-running proxy battle, the activist shareholder Warren Lichtenstein said Monday that his hedge fund, Steel Partners II, had amassed enough support to remove Adaptec‘s chief executive, Sundi Sundaresh, from the board of the data storage company.

headline.main: Adaptec Chief Is Likely to Be Ousted From Board
